title: Azir needs a "Totally Not" skin thats him in a raptor costume.
body: And his soldiers can be the smaller raptors!

replies.body: {{champion:5}} should have a "Totally Not Jarvan IV" skin, and {{champion:59}} should have a "Totally Not Xin Zhao" skin.
